remarks: Defining property of a normed module.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
isnlm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
isnlm.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
isnlm.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
isnlm.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
isnlm.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
isnlm.a $e |- A = ( norm ` F ) $.
nmvs $p |- ( ( W e. NrmMod /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( A ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) $.
